name: Gravity is Mercy
description:
The poor spaceship is out of control! But no worries, in this game you can be the god of gravity and give that ship an astrodynamic hand! 

Use your mouse to directly control the mass and size of a celestial body.

Utlize physical proporties including gravity, solar wind and black holes to plan a trajectory for the lost ship.

Then press the "Execute" button to see how does your ship get to its destination!

Programming & Game Design & Levels: wwhhff

Art assets: From Unity Asset Store

Cartoon Space Set - shMEL Studio

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/planets-with-space-background-in-flat-style-95983

Planets with Space background in flat style - DinV studio

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/planets-with-space-background-in-flat-style-95983
